item.title: Google Drive Backup using Rclone
item.description: For 8 TB of data storage on Google Drive, plus my own Google organization, I am paying Â£30/month, which is a pretty good deal. I wanted to use this space for backing up my NAS, but it was proving difficult. The program I was recommended for Linux backup, Duplicati, was not the best for this purpose. My backup runs would not complete, they would be slow, and full of syncing errors.
